snippet.title: Metin2 Gameplay Trailer 2017
snippet.description: Roam the breathtaking landscapes of Metin2 and follow dangerous paths. Choose from between five character classes – Warriors, Ninjas, Shamans, Suras and Lycans - and face lurking danger in the darkest corners of your homeland. Put your skill to the test in epic PvE battles against dragons and sinister demon lords or enter merciless PvP duels. Ride into combat on the back of a majestic steed or a wild beast and explore the world with a loyal pet at your side. Conduct lightning fast attacks, hitting multiple enemies with a single powerful blow, and become the most feared opponent on the battlefield!
